alert.note: Alert for North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 12:16PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Converse County through 100 PM MDT... At 1216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boxelder, or 24 miles southwest of Douglas, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Campbell Creek Campground around 1250 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
